sentences.en: A serpentine column moving through the elephant grass on the back of a knoll.
sentences.cn: 一列蜿蜒拄型的纵队正穿行在草木稀少的小山背后.

sentences.en: A slight knoll in the grass shows where the temporary railway line once ran.
sentences.cn: 草地里的小丘显示着铁路曾经过的轨迹.

sentences.en: After knoll to see the Boundary Obelisk, we had a swim at Kau Leng Chung Beach.
sentences.cn: 看过屿南界碑后,于狗岭涌沙滩分别下过咸淡水.

sentences.en: By courtesy of the Museum of Modern Art, New York , gift of Knoll Associates, Inc.
sentences.cn: 巴塞隆纳椅,密斯?范?德?罗厄设计于1929年; 现藏纽约市现代艺术博物馆.

sentences.en: Every day, Anthony and I would drive to the other side of the lake and sit on a grassy knoll to look at the property and dream of what it would be like to live there.
sentences.cn: 每一天, 我和安东尼都要去那里, 停在湖的另一边, 坐在一个长满草的小丘上看著那座房子, 幻想著如果我们住在里面会是什麽样子.

sentences.en: He looked around on that knoll for a while , transfixed with amazement, and then went down.
sentences.cn: 他呆呆的在那小山丘上望了一会儿, 走下来.

sentences.en: John Terry was actually the gunman on the grassy knoll.
sentences.cn: 特里其实就是躲在碧草丘上刺杀肯尼迪的凶手.

sentences.en: Knoll thinks for a moment and says, " Beg for mercy. "
sentences.cn: 克诺想了一会后说: “ 乞求宽大. ”

sentences.en: Mr. Knoll uses several products to create an everyday style that looks well - groomed but not contrived.
sentences.cn: 科诺尔每天会用好几种美发用品打造出整洁却又不显做作的发型.

sentences.en: Right about here, Seidler said, pointing to a gap of sage between our knoll and the houses, is where most of the pronghorn seem to cross through.
sentences.cn: 塞德勒指着我们所在小山和房屋间的鼠尾草豁口说，看起来大多数叉角羚就从这里通过。

sentences.en: Silver had terrible hard work getting up the knoll.
sentences.cn: 对于希尔弗来说,爬上那小山丘真不是件容易事.
